channel.title: [F2P]RSCFusion - RuneScape Classic Skilling & PKing
channel.description:
[size=14pt][URL=http://"http://www.rscfusion.com"]RSCFusion[/URL][/size] [size=10pt][URL=http://"www.rscfusion.com"]RuneScape Classic Private server[/URL][/size]
[URL=http://www.rscfusion.com]RSCFusion[/URL] is a[URL=http://www.rscfusion.com] RuneScape Classic private server[/URL] with F2P content only added, friendly staff and community. We have every F2P skill working and even more. We're focusing to make RuneScape Classic F2P replica, with few unique features, like our Stat Changer, which allows you to change your stats between the levels you have trained so far, so you won't have to make a new character when you feel like going to wilderness as strength pure, we have 'batched' the skills so you won't have to click all over again like usually you have to on [URL=http://http://www.rscfusion.com]RuneScape Classic[/URL].
[b]Note:[/b] This thread does not show all content that's in game, thread might be slightly outdated since we're making new updates every day, so be sure to check us out.
How to play: 1.Go and[URL=http://"www.rscfusion.com/register.php"] register [/URL]at our website. 2.Go to your profile and click 'My Characters' then click 'Add a new character'. 3.Go to Client Download section of our forums and make sure you download the latest one(Topic with biggest version number). 4.Extract the client with WinRar 5.Click on 'Run Client'.
These are just few pictures of the gameplay; They do not show everything that's added. [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/6782/ctf.png[/img] [IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/4712/asdnb.png[/img] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/760/guildb.png[/img] [IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/1442/xmas2v.png[/img]

item.title: [F2P]RSCFusion - RuneScape Classic Skilling & PKing
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Nicholas_, post:70, topic:427783”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=530476.msg3894999#msg3894999 date=1327230196]
It’s online still. Nobody is playing though.
[/quote]

Because you have no fucking website and noone can register…

I still play, just not much because I’m always like, the only one on.[/quote]
I’m really sorry for that…And I mean it, after I get the domain sorted out I will do my best to revive it.

Apparently the customer support isn’t the best on the new host either, because I was unsure how to configure the domain for the vps manually I had to contact the customer support, which was 8 days ago(15/01/2012). I’ve had 6 replies, each reply takes them day or two to write and the reply I get everytime is like 1-2 lines and the instructions given are unclear, but that’s what you get for cheap price I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: [F2P]RSCFusion - RuneScape Classic Skilling & PKing
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:62, topic:427783"][quote author=Crooks link=topic=530476.msg3892368#msg3892368 date=1326997875]

Whats happening? Webpage is still down. I loged in and nobody was online.
This is the end,it seems.

Yeah, and there was 104,5+ hours ago he bought a new domain… Which is 61 hours late since it should take 24-48 hours to set it up…

EDIT: I bought ‘rscfusion.org’ domain, it will be active in 24-48 hours.

And guess who’s fault it is? That’s right! It’s kinda sad that you come here and post that shit when you fucked it all up in first place, and then you go all around and talk bullshit to people how bad owner I am and act innocent.

Isn’t it bit immature that you went online and tried to ruin the economy by spawning shitloads of hats and giving them out?..Good thing that not much are playing atm.

I bought a host from dewlance.com and the domain too, it took 2 days to receive the domain, and after that I linked the domain with our VPS, but somehow the domain isn’t working, I opened a support ticket to ask them what’s wrong, but their support seems to be poor as hell. After I get everything working again, I will buy another month VPS from my own pocket and start advertising, updating etc. I think it will be a lot better now that Crooks is gone and replaced with professional advertiser/website programmer.

Bullshit obvious since people have told me that I should leave way long before we did not come along…

Bullshit since I haven’t logged in on RSCF… and Crooks is probably ‘carisa’ since she asked for my character to train… And if you still had my admin rank on that char… its your fault no one else.

And why would i give you the RSCF.com domain if its on my namecheap account and we aint coming along? playing innocent for what? And why did I post about the domain? because if you state something like 24-48 hours and aint editing it… then its a false advertise.

Anyways /ignore thread,
[/quote]
It’s pathetic how you constantly act innocent to keep your reputation in this community, I feel bad for those who believe your lies.[/quote]
You’re the one who is really sick here.
What the fuck am I lieing about? Im telling you the situations… why would I take responsibily for something i haven’t done?

Also i don’t care about reputation, That’s what you did when you was 15 and trouser authority.
Also you can’t stand a shit for what you’re doing and face the fact that you have taking too bad decisions.
Well can’t be easy living in Finland 17 years old razorcutcut.

Hugs(F)

Read full topic

After I get everything working again, I will buy another month VPS from my own pocket and start advertising, updating etc. I think it will be a lot better now that Crooks is gone and replaced with professional advertiser/website programmer.

item.title: [F2P]RSCFusion - RuneScape Classic Skilling & PKing
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

mattic:

alright. it also says failed to load main-class manifest attribute whenever i use the jar file?

You are supposed to run it via Run Client.bat, but if u are using different OS than windows, you need to run it via command prompt. Navigate to the RSCF folder and copy paste the line starting with “java -cp…” to the prompt.

Read full topic

So website is not avaible for now.

http://uppit.com/73x9uvch8ovr/RSCFusion_Client_v.4.2.0_UPDATED.zip

Can’t connect.
[/quote]
It seems that there were some problems with MySQL, took about 3 hours to find out the reason, but it’s back online now. Go and enjoy

Also P2P is going to be released soon.

EDIT: I bought ‘rscfusion.org’ domain, it will be active in 24-48 hours.[/quote]

OH MY GOD THANK YOU YOU CANNOT BELIEVE HOW HELLISH THE LAST LIKE 5 DAYS HAVE BEEN ONLY BEING ABLE TO PLAY THOSE SHITTY 600+ DATA SERVERS I FUCKING LOVE YOU.

<3
